content_fields.desc: **Required.** A human-readable description of the file. This is recommended to be the filename of the original upload.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: The original filename of the uploaded file.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: Information about the file referred to in ``url``.
content_fields.title: FileInfo

content_fields.desc:
Required if the file is unencrypted. The URL (typically `MXC URI`_)
to the file.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc:
Required if the file is encrypted. Information on the encrypted
file, as specified in |encrypted_files|_.
content_fields.title: EncryptedFile

content_fields.desc: The mimetype of the file e.g. ``application/msword``.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: The size of the file in bytes.
content_fields.title: integer

content_fields.desc:
The URL to the thumbnail of the file. Only present if the
thumbnail is unencrypted.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc:
Information on the encrypted thumbnail file, as specified in
|encrypted_files|_. Only present if the thumbnail is encrypted.
content_fields.title: EncryptedFile

content_fields.desc: Metadata about the image referred to in ``thumbnail_url``.
content_fields.title: ThumbnailInfo

content_fields.desc:
The intended display height of the image in pixels. This may
differ from the intrinsic dimensions of the image file.
content_fields.title: integer

content_fields.desc:
The intended display width of the image in pixels. This may
differ from the intrinsic dimensions of the image file.
content_fields.title: integer

content_fields.desc: The mimetype of the image, e.g. ``image/jpeg``.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: Size of the image in bytes.
content_fields.title: integer

desc: This message represents a generic file.
title: FileMessage
